testcase.name: testAuraIsTakenWithShadowMadness

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: The attack of the minion is different than expected. Index: 0. Expected minion: Minion(Chillwind Yeti) 5/5 ?. Actual minion: Minion(Chillwind Yeti) 4/5

testcase.name: testShadowMadnessWithIllidan

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: The size of the board is different than expected. Expected board: [Minion(Slime) 1/2 ?, Minion(Haunted Creeper) 1/2 ?, Minion(Haunted Creeper) 1/2 ?, Minion(Haunted Creeper) 1/2 ?, Minion(Haunted Creeper) 1/2 ?, Minion(Haunted Creeper) 1/2 ?, Minion(Haunted Creeper) 1/2 ?]. Actual board: [Minion(Haunted Creeper) 1/2, Minion(Haunted Creeper) 1/2, Minion(Haunted Creeper) 1/2, Minion(Haunted Creeper) 1/2, Minion(Haunted Creeper) 1/2, Minion(Haunted Creeper) 1/2]
